findings.title: Reentrancy in wHakka.stake(address,uint256,uint256)
findings.description: The function wHakka.stake(address,uint256,uint256) contains reentrancy vulnerabilities due to external calls and state variable modifications after the calls.

findings.title: Reentrancy in wHakka.stake(address,uint256,uint256)
findings.description: The function stake() in contract wHakka allows reentrancy through external calls.

findings.title: Reentrancy in wHakka.unstake(address,uint256,uint256)
findings.description: The unstake function in wHakka contract is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to external calls and event emissions.
